Liquidity providers receive a share of f: Liquidity providers receive a share of fees paid during trading in exchange for providing liquidity on the network.
The data relating to markets on this pag: The data relating to markets on this page is obtained from nodes on the Vega Blockchain.
Provides its software under open source: Provides its software under open source licences
Does not operate or run the Vega Blockch: Does not operate or run the Vega Blockchain or any other blockchain
Does not create, generate or warrant the: Does not create, generate or warrant the accuracy of the data
Has no liability for any loss arising fr: Has no liability for any loss arising from the use of that data.
The market name, code and settlement ass: The market name, code and settlement asset
The ideal committed liquidity to operate: The ideal committed liquidity to operate the market, derived from the maximum open interest observed over a rolling time window. If the total commitment is currently below this level then LPs can set the fee level with a new commitment.
The current amount of liquidity supplied: The current amount of liquidity supplied for this market.
The fee percentage (per trade) charged b: The fee percentage (per trade) charged by liquidity providers on this market
The total number of contracts traded in: The total number of contracts traded in the last 24 hours.
The current market status - those below: The current market status - those below the black target stake line are at risk of entering liquidity auction
